Name: Christmas Patchwork Frozen
About the game: Assemble patchwork mosaics while you travel with Alice and the famous characters of Wonderland and Looking-Glass Land! 120 unique levels: a mad tea-party, unbelievable royal croquet, a merry sea quadrille... What other pictures await you in 6 locations? More than 10 hours of gameplay, convenient controls, and special quests and trophies. Assemble mosaics from 6 different materials and help Alice become the queen of this incredible world. - 120 unique patchwork mosaics and 6 different materials. - Special quests and trophies for the real pros. - Entertaining gameplay for players of all ages. - Incredible story and characters familiar from childhood.
